name: Lumiva Legacy
summary: Lumiva Legacy is a fast-paced action platformer about three young multivas, Alex "Bingo" Rivero, Salamon Avery, and Roy Cruz, on their journey to stop D-Tech from invading their home of Neuo Town. The trio will have to put their skills to the test to conquer many challenges, defeat countless foes, and explore exotic locations with their various abilities and the help of Elemental Charges!
